item.title: Game Development
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:10, topic:69959”][quote author=thiefmn6092 link=topic=102779.msg1038725#msg1038725 date=1174615708]

nice man whats it called? im makin a site atm but i want a project

Adventure Of The Legends.
[/quote]

What you should do is think of a name later, one that has something more to do with the game. The current name is such a generic game name, I’ve seen too many rendition’s of games like “Adventure of *” or “Legends of *” etc. I used to spend a lot of time just reading the forums at gamedev.net but never signed up. Every new game project that never went anywhere had a similar name, lol. Just a suggestion, I’m actually pretty guilty for doing this :/[/quote]

Well, thanks for the suggestion. As for the game name it is something until I get a better idea & I probably will just get a name after i’m actually working on the game itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Development
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:3, topic:69959”][quote author=devull link=topic=102779.msg1038712#msg1038712 date=1174615565]
nice man whats it called? im makin a site atm but i want a project
[/quote]

Adventure Of The Legends.[/quote]

What you should do is think of a name later, one that has something more to do with the game. The current name is such a generic game name, I’ve seen too many rendition’s of games like “Adventure of *” or “Legends of *” etc. I used to spend a lot of time just reading the forums at gamedev.net but never signed up. Every new game project that never went anywhere had a similar name, lol. Just a suggestion, I’m actually pretty guilty for doing this

Read full topic
